title: Not Quite Married: Not Quite Yet Series Book 1
description: Meet. Fall in love. Get married. That is the natural order of things. But for Ashley, marriage is nothing like she dreamed. Not only does she have no say in who she marries, but the tall and sexy CEO wonâ€™t stop teasing her. Ashley made a vow to get out of the marriage within a hundred days. Will she keep her word?--The Not Quite Yet series follows the life of Ashley Smith as she navigates her new life after being forced into an arranged marriage. Get ready to laugh, cry, and swoon.
author: Toni Adebisi
